content: You are nailing it.If you could see past the hundreds of thousands of innocent Iraqi dead because of votes by people like Hillary, you are going to buy into anything. The US has to wake up to the damage we have done.You are using the same metric I did when casting a vote and why I still think Trump is better than Hillary as POTUS (not all that high of a bar) at this point.It is Woodrow Wilson like — Keep Us Out Of War…and like Wilson, he may still get us into one.
